name: nativescript-media-metadata-retriever
description: Plugin to retrieve the metadata of media files. Based on android's MediaMetadataRetriever class

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.android.emulator: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build undefined && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-media-metadata-retriever && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
